resources.string:
Want to setup VoiceGPT as your default voice assistant for easy access with gestures or device buttons? Follow these steps:

1. Tap the Setup device assistant button.
2. Open the Default digital assistant app settings.
3. Select VoiceGPT from the list of available apps.
Activity not found. Please install or enable ChatGPT
Play Store not found. Please install or enable Play Store
Voice input settings are not available on this device
